knimeNode.name: Domination Maximizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Domination Maximizer computes the k data records (representative skyline) which maximize the number of dominated data records.

fullDescription.intro: This node computes the skyline and a representative skyline. The skyline only contains undominated points based on the preferences from the Preference Creator node. In contrast to this the representative skyline contains k data records who maximize the number of dominated points. The parameter k can be changed in the dialog.
fullDescription.option: Size of the representative skyline (Parameter k)

ports.inPort: A database connection from a Preference Creator node
ports.outPort: The undominated data records of the underlying data table of the database connection
The representative skyline of the underlying data table of the database connection
